import Link from 'next/link' import renderHTML from "react-render-html"; import moment from "moment"; import { API } from "../../config"; const BlogCard=({blog}) =>{ return (

{blog.title}

Written by {blog.postedBy.name} | Published{" "} {moment(blog.updatedAt).fromNow()}

blog categories and tags

image
{renderHTML(blog.excerpt)}
Read more
) } export default BlogCard
